tuv.seg: &Apply this font to tabular data (project files, statistics, etc.)
将此字体应用到表格数据（项目文件、统计等等）(&A)
自动在词典中查找片段文本(&A)
&Ignore hits with very different case (e.g. FOO vs foo)
忽略大小写不同的命中（例如 FOO 和 foo）(&I)

(In the user's manual, see 'Files to translate' > 'File formats' for a list of supported file formats.) To add files to the project, click on the Copy Files to Source Folder... button in the Project Files window or call this action from the Project menu and select the source files you want to copy.
（在用户手册中，参见“待翻译文件” > “文件格式”来了解支持的文件格式。） 要添加文件到项目中，在项目文件窗口中点击复制文件到源文件夹...按钮或从项目菜单中调用此功能，并选定想要复制的源文件。
(Software that does this is called "machine translation", and you will have to look elsewhere for it.)
（执行此操作的软件称为“机器翻译”，需要去他处找寻。）
……和近 30 种其他文件格式大小写
1) Reduce the number of source files and translate in batches;
1) 减少原文文件数量，分批翻译；
2) 在命令行或 OmegaT 启动脚本中指定 “java -Xmx<size-in-MB>M -jar OmegaT.jar” 来增加 OmegaT 的可用内存量； 当前设置为 {0}MB；
<s0>OmegaT</s0> is a free translation memory application that works on Windows, macOS, Linux...
<s0>OmegaT</s0> 是免费的翻译记忆应用程序，适用于 Windows、macOS、Linux……它是为专业翻译人员设计的工具。
<s0>OmegaT</s0> is available in many different versions in order to suit a range of user requirements.
<s0>OmegaT</s0> 有多种不同版本可供选择，以满足各种用户需求。
A restart is required in order to apply these changes
需要重新启动才能应用这些更改
A step-by-step guide on how to use the Text Extraction and the Text Merging utilities from Rainbow to pre- and post-process files to be translated using OmegaT.
关于如何用 Rainbow 的文本提取和文本合并功能对要用 OmegaT 翻译的文件进行预处理和后处理的详细指南。
A vast range of functions, an uncluttered interface, and, most importantly, constant, regular open-source development!
它有着丰富的功能、整洁的界面，最重要的是持续且正规的开源开发！
After several of these operations, select <m0> <g1>Edit</g1> <g2>Realign pending</g2> </m0> to update the alignment of the other segments.
进行若干次此类操作后，选择 <m0> <g1>Edit</g1> <g2>Realign pending</g2> </m0> 来更新其他片段的对齐。
After the automatic process, the alignment of two files generally requires manual corrections.
经过自动化处理后，对齐的两个文件通常需要手工修正。
Alignment involves creating a bilingual translation memory from monolingual documents that have already been translated.
执行对齐操作可以从已经翻译过的单语言文档创建双语翻译记忆库。
All preferences protected by the master password will be reset.
所有由主密码保护的首选项都将被重置。
Allows the user create an entry in the default glossary file.
Allows you to activate/deactivate the Machine Translation tools offered.
允许您激活/停用提供的机器翻译工具。
Also check that the target language code of your project against the available vocabularies in the setup window.
还要根据设置窗口中的可用词汇表检查项目的译文语言代码。
Alternatively, if you already know which version you wish to download, click on the button to have an overview of the different OmegaT versions available.
或者，如果你已经知道想要下载哪个版本，请点击按钮以概览 OmegaT 的各种版本。
Although many users are aware of this, their reaction is often "But I can't program!".
许多用户意识到了这一点，但他们的反应经常是“可我并不会编程！”。
An Instant Start Guide, which guides you through the main procedures and functions of OmegaT, is displayed in the OmegaT user interface by default.
默认情况下，OmegaT 用户界面上会显示带你全面了解 OmegaT 主要操作和功能的《快速入门指南》。
An introductory video to OmegaT in English by John Moran.
John Moran 的英文 OmegaT 介绍视频。
分析字符串 - 已完成 {0} / {1}
And when they find things that don't work, or deficiencies in the documentation, to tell us about them.
发现无法使用的功能或者文档中的缺陷时，请告知我们。
Are you sure you want to reset the master password?
你确定要重置主密码吗？
Bartender yells loud: Your page cannot be found, boy Buy another drink
调酒师大声叫： 你的页面找不到， 小子再买杯饮料！
Before the spell check function can be used, a suitable dictionary or dictionaries (i.e. for your target language) must be installed.
在使用拼写检查功能前，必须先（针对您的译文语言）安装适合的词典。
Below is a list of areas for which further volunteers would be more than welcome!
以下所列的工作领域，欢迎更多志愿者的加入！
关于 OmegaT 的博客页面。
But I can't program at all, I hear you say.
我听进去了，但是我完全不懂编程。
But programming isn't the only job needing to be done.
但是编程并不是唯一的工作内容。
By Marco Cevoli and Sergio Alasia.
作者：Marco Cevoli 和 Sergio Alasia。
作者：Sheila Gomes（巴西葡萄牙语）。
Changes the case of the highlighted text in the target segment to the selected option (Lower case, Upper case, Title case or Sentence case).
将译文片段中高亮选定的文本的按所选选项（小写、大写、标题式大小写或句子式大小写）改变大小写。
Check <g0>History Completion</g0> to display suggested words as soon as their first letters are entered.
勾选 <g0>历史完成</g0> 后，输入开头几个字母就会显示出建议的单词。
Check <g0>History Prediction</g0> to display suggested words that commonly follow the word that has just been entered.
勾选<g0>历史预测</g0> 后，输入开头几个字母后就会显示出其后面的常用搭配。
Check however that the language codes are exactly the same: an FR-FR dictionary will not work with an FR target setting, for example.
但需要确保语言代码完全一致：例如，FR-FR 词典在以 FR 为译文的设置下将无作用。
Check that your dict files are in the correct folder (or in a subfolder below it).
检查词典文件是否在正确的文件夹中（或在该文件夹的子文件夹下）。
Check the <g0>Use Fuzzy Matching for Dictionary Entries</g0> option if you want dictionaries to display words that have the same root.
如果你希望词典能够展示根词汇相同的词语，勾选<g0>为词典条目使用模糊匹配</g0> 选项。
Checks to see whether a more recent version of <a0>OmegaT</a0> has been released.
检查是否已经发布了更新版本的
Choose the one that provides the best results.
选择效果最好的一种方法。
Click <g0>Continue</g0> to access the next step.
Click in the other column on the translation corresponding to the first segment.
点击另一列中与第一个片段相对应的翻译。
Click the <g0>Edit</g0> tab on the Wikipedia page.
点击Wikipedia 页面的 <g0>编辑</g0> 标签卡。
Clicking on <g0>Install new dictionary</g0> button will open the Dictionary installer window, where you can select the dictionaries you want to install.
点击<g0>安装新词典</g0>按钮将打开词典安装器窗口，可选择要安装的词典。
Clicking on one will save the current project, close it and open the other project.
点击其中之一会保存并关闭当前项目然后打开另一个项目。
Compatible with other translation memory applications (TMX, TTX, TXML, XLIFF, SDLXLIFF)
兼容其他翻译记忆应用程序（TMX、TTX、TXML、XLIFF、SDLXLIFF）
Continuing Professional Development is the current buzzword!
持续专业发展（Continuing Professional Development）在当下可是个热词！
Converts the current project into a MED package.
将当前项目转换为 MED 包。
将文件复制到原文文件夹(&Y)...
Copies the selected files to the <f0>source</f0> folder and reloads the project to load the new files.
选择文件后复制到<f0>原文</f0> 文件夹，然后重新载入项目以载入新文件。
将文件复制到原文文件夹...
Copy the URL of the page (ending with <g0>action=edit</g0>) and paste it into <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
复制该页面的URL（以 <g0>action=edit</g0>结束) 然后粘贴到<a1>OmegaT</a1>中。.
Copy the text and paste it into the translated version of the Wikipedia page.
复制文本并将其粘贴到 Wikipedia 页面的翻译版本中。
Copying the files manually makes sense if you already have suitable dictionary files on your system, for instance as part of your Apache OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Firefox or Thunderbird installation.
如果系统中已经有合适的词典文件，例如来自于 Apache OpenOffice、LibreOffice、Firefox 或 Thunderbird 的已安装文件，那么手工复制文件是有意义的。
Could not create project dir at {0}
无法在 {0} 创建项目目录
Creates a local copy of a remote OmegaT project.
创建远程 OmegaT 项目的本地副本。
Creates and opens a new project.
Creates the target document corresponding to the current document in translation.
为当前正在翻译的文档创建对应的译文文档
Creates the target documents based on your translation.
根据你的翻译创建译文文档。
Current memory usage by the VM: {0}MB; of which free memory: {1}MB; maximum available: {2}MB
虚拟机当前内存使用量：{0}MB；其中可用内存：{1}MB；最大可用：{2}MB
Define the translation as being empty.
Deletes the translation and set the segment as untranslated.
删除译文并将片段设置为未译
Dictionaries in <a0>OmegaT</a0> are based on the StarDict or on the Lingvo DSL format.
<a0>OmegaT</a0> 中的字典基于StarDict或者Lingvo DSL格式。
Diego Merino - 英语 > 西班牙语译者
显示 TBX 词汇表的上下文描述(&G)
Displays <l0>Project properties</l0> dialog to edit project languages and folder locations.
展示 <l0>项目属性</l0> 对话框以编辑项目语言和文件夹位置。
Displays copyright, credits and license information.
显示版权、制作人员和授权信息。
Displays the list of new functionalities, enhancements and bug fixes for each new release.
显示每个新版本的新功能、改进和修复的 Bug。
Does the folder contain three files of the same name, with extensions?
该文件夹是否包含三个带不同扩展名的同名文件？
检查问题之前不要询问
Download the file - it should be a <f0>tarball</f0> archive (extension <e1>tar.bz</e1> or <e2>tar.bz2</e2>).
下载文件——文件应该是<f0>tarball</f0>档案（扩展名为<e1>tar.bz</e1>或<e2>tar.bz2</e2>）。
Emptiness of soul Forever aching blackness Your help page not found
灵魂的空虚无界 永世痛苦的暗夜 找不到你的帮助页
允许每个项目自有命令
Ephemeral page I am the Blue Screen of Death No one hears your screams
页面昙花一现 死亡蓝屏在你面前 你的尖叫无人听见
Exciting help page Gossamer threads hold you back 404 not found
帮助页面扣人心弦 蛛丝紧缠裹足不前 404 找不到页面
Exports the current selection to a text file for processing.
Fatal error encountered - saving project file with '.recover' backup extension.
遇到致命错误 - 正在使用“.recover”备份扩展名保存项目文件。
Folder {0} was automatically created for team mode project
为团队模式项目自动创建了文件夹 {0}
For advocates of open-source software, this freedom is even more important than the exemption from having to pay anything.
对于开源软件的拥护者来说，这种自由比免于付费更重要。
For example, if you have selected ES-MX (Mexican Spanish) as the target language, the dictionary files must be named es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff.
例如，如果已经选择ES-MX（墨西哥西班牙语）作为译文语言，词典的文件必须命名为es_MX.dic和es_MX.aff。
From the YouTube OmegaT series by Miguel Navarro (in Spanish).
Miguel Navarro 的 OmegaT 系列，来自 YouTube（西班牙语）。
Give access to the ten last edited projects.
可以访问最后编辑的十个项目。
Gives access to the project folders.
可以访问项目的各个文件夹。
Go to Preferences > External Search to enable.
前往 首选项 > 外部搜索 来启用。
Guida completa a OmegaT: tecniche, trucchi e consigli per traduttori e project manager
OmegaT 完全指南：翻译人员和项目经理的技巧、提示和建议
在线 HTML 用户手册
Have you considered writing some user documentation yourself?
你有想过自己撰写点用户文档吗？
Have you ever written an article for your professional association's journal?
你曾为你的专业协会期刊写过文章吗？
Help you are seeking From your path it is fleeing Its winter has come
你苦苦寻觅的帮助 正逃离你要走的路 寒冬已将它逮住
How to download and install dictionaries
How to translate Wordpress XLIFF files
如何翻译 Wordpress XLIFF 文件
I've been using OmegaT as a professional translator for over 10 years, benefiting in the early days from its ease of use and extremely helpful forum.
我作为专业译者已经使用 OmegaT 超过 10 年，在早期因其易用性和极其有用的论坛受益匪浅。

If <g0>Show Relevant Suggestions Automatically</g0> option is checked, Auto-completer is launched automatically by typing the first letters of a translated glossary entry, or by typing "<" in case of tags.
如果勾选 <g0>自动显示相关建议</g0> 选项，在输入术语条目的开头几个字母时，或者输入标签的"<" 时，剩下内容就会被自动补全。
If <l0>automatic searching in dictionaries</l0> is disabled, this function allows you to search for the selected word in the dictionaries.
如果<l0>自动在词典中搜索</l0> 未被启用，则此功能可让您在词典中查找所选单词。
If issue checking is slow, try disabling some of the optional checks.
如果问题检查很慢，请尝试禁用某些可选检查。
If it is <e0>tar.bz</e0>, you have forgotten to unpack (untar) it.
如果扩展名是<e0>tar.bz</e0>，说明忘了解压。
If necessary, edit the file names of the dictionary or change your project's language settings.
必要时可以编辑词典文件名或更改项目的语言设置。
If no text has been selected, the current source segment is written to this file.
将当前选中内容导出至文本文件进行处理。
If no text is selected, <a3>OmegaT</a3> selects the word that contains the letter immediately to the right of the cursor.
如果没有选中任何文本，<a3>OmegaT</a3>会选择紧挨着光标右边的那个字符所属的单词。
If not, why not write an article on using OmegaT?
如果还没，为什么不写一篇文章讨论 OmegaT 的使用呢？
If only one file is present, check its extension.
如果只有一个文件，请检查其扩展名。
If part of the target segment has been selected, this function overwrites the selected portion.
如果已经选择了译文片段的一部分，则此功能会覆盖所选部分。
If several translation engines are selected, then <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> is also used to switch between them and insert the last one selected.
在它们之间切换并插入最后一个选定的结果。
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will be inserted at the cursor position.
如果在模糊匹配内选择了部分文本，那么只有被选中的部分插入到光标位置处。
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will replace the whole target segment.
如果在模糊匹配内选择了部分文本，那么只有被选中的部分替换掉整个译文片段。
If the alignment looks as if it could be improved, try changing the parameters.
如果对齐部分有待改进，请尝试调整参数。
If the current segment is the first one in a file, it moves to the last segment of the previous file.
如果当前片段是文件中的第一个片段，则会移动到上一个文件的最后一个片段。
If the current segment is the last segment in a file, it moves to the first segment of the next file.
如果当前片段是文件中的最后一个片段，则会移动到下一个文件的第一个片段。
If the documents are not available, the entry is greyed out.
如果文档不可用，则条目会灰掉。

If the spell checker is not working, then make sure first that the check box <g0>"Automatically check the spelling of text"</g0> in the spell checker dialog (<g1>Options > Spell checking...)</g1> is checked.
如果拼写检查器未能正常工作，先确认勾选了拼写检查器对话框中的复选框 <g0>“自动检查文本的拼写”</g0>（<g1>选项 > 拼写检查...）</g1> 。</g1>
If there's several alternative translations available for the active segment, you can label the alternative selected as the default translation.
如果当前片段有多个替代译文，您可以将所选择的译文标记为默认译文。
If they are used by some other application on your system, they will disappear from that application, too.
如果系统上有其他应用程序使用它们，它们也会从那些程序中消失。

If you are already reasonably familiar with computers in general and choose a straightforward scripting language like Javascript or Tcl/Tk, you could teach yourself enough to be able to write simple but useful scripts within just a couple of weeks.
如果你已经相当熟悉计算机，并选择一种简单易懂的脚本语言，例如 Javascript 或Tcl/Tk，可以在几周内就通过自学来写出简单却有用的脚本。
If you can program in another language, you can write code to support the core application.
如果你会其他编程语言，可以编写代码来支持核心应用程序。

If you have already translated a large body of text, and then realize the target language code of the project does not match the spell checker's language code (you specified pt_BR as the language, but there are no pt_BR vocabularies, for instance) you can simply copy the two corresponding files and rename them (e.g. from <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> to <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> and <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).
如果翻译了大量文本后，发现项目的译文语言代码与拼写检查器的语言代码不匹配（例如，指定pt_BR为译文语言，但没有pt_BR词汇表），您只需对应的两个文件复制并重命名（例如，将 <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0>和 <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> 复制并重命名为 <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> 和 <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>）。
If you have found OmegaT useful and would like to express your gratitude by making a <a0>donation</a0> on our Paypal account.
如果你觉得 OmegaT 很有用，并且想要表达感谢，可以向我们的 Paypal 账号<a0>捐赠</a0>。
If you haven't yet saved the project, this manually confirms whether you really wish to quit.
如果尚未保存项目，则此操作会手工确认您是否确实要退出。

If you only have a standard Spanish dictionary available, with file names es_es.dic and es_es.aff for instance, you can copy these files to es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff, and the spelling dictionary will work.
如果只有标准西班牙语词典（例如文件名为 es_es.dic 及 es_es.aff），可以将这些文件复制更名为 es_MX.dic 及 es_MX.aff，拼写词典会正常运作。
If you select a text string (in any pane) before pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>F</k2> </k0>, the text will be pasted by default in the <g3>Search for</g3> field.
If you select a text string (in any pane) before pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>K</k2> </k0>, the text will be pasted by default in the <g3>Search for</g3> field.
If you select a text string (in any pane) before pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Shift</k2> <k3>G</k3> </k0>, the text will be pasted by default in the <g4>Source term</g4> field.
允许用户在默认的词汇表文件中创建条目。
If you're a programmer and you happen to know Java, please check the documentation in the <a0>source code</a0> under /docs_devel for information on how to get started.
如果你是程序员又刚好懂 Java，请查看<a0>源代码</a0>中 docs_devel 文件夹内的文档来了解如何开始研发。
If, for whatever reason, you need to do this from time to time, it may make sense to copy the files involved to a different folder, reserved just for use by OmegaT.
如果出于某种原因，需要不时地执行该操作，将这些文件复制到另一个文件夹（仅供 OmegaT 使用）可能更好。
导入 Wiki 页面失败
In <g0>Heapwise</g0> mode, the texts are evaluated globally.
在<g0>Heapwise</g0> 模式下，文本是整体评估的。
In <g1>Parsewise</g1> mode, they are evaluated segment by segment.
在 <g1>Parsewise</g1>模式下，文本按照片段评估。
In OmegaT, select <g0>Options > Spell Checking</g0>, then click <g1>Choose </g1> beside the Dictionary file folder field.
在OmegaT中，选择<g0>选项 > 拼写检查</g0> ，然后点击词典文件文件夹字段旁的<g1>选择</g1>。
In addition, two menu entries allow opening directly the current source and target documents and the writable glossary.
另外，有两个菜单项允许直接打开当前的原文与译文文档以及可写词汇表。
In most cases, the lower the <g0>Average score</g0> is, better the alignment will be.
在大多数情况下 <g0>Average score</g0> 越低，对齐效果越好。
In the Editor, the translation is displayed as <EMPTY>
在编辑器中，译文会显示为<空>
In the target document, nothing will appear for this segment.
此片段在译文文档中不会显示任何东西。
In your file manager, create a new folder in a suitable location in which to store spelling dictionaries (D:\Translations\spellcheckers in the example below).
用文件管理器，在适当的位置创建新文件夹用来保存拼写词典（在下面的示例中创建位置为 D:\Translations\spellcheckers）。
Information on procedures and features of OmegaT for advanced users which can be found on other sites.
针对高级用户的 OmegaT 操作和功能信息可在其他网站上找到。
Inserts only one tag (among the missing ones) at the cursor position.
在光标位置处只插入一个标签（所有缺失标签之一）。
Inserts the currently selected fuzzy match at the cursor position.
在光标位置插入当前选中的模糊匹配。
Inserts the source at the cursor position.
Inserts the source tags (if they where missing) at the cursor position.
在光标位置插入（如果有缺失的）原文标签。
Installing and running OmegaT" in the User Manual.
参见用户手册的“第三章 安装与运行 OmegaT”。
与 Google 翻译的接口
It can be found in the "docs" folder in your OmegaT program folder.
在 OmegaT 程序文件夹中的“docs”文件夹内可以找到用户手册。
It does not translate for you!
It is a tool intended for professional translators.
<s0>OmegaT</s0> 是免费的翻译记忆应用程序，适用于 Windows、macOS、Linux……它是为专业翻译人员设计的工具。
It is consequently able to use the huge range of free spelling dictionaries available for these applications.
因此，它可以使用大量可用于这些程序的免费拼写词典。
It is simpler, however, to look for dictionaries online, using the <e0>URL of online dictionaries</e0> field:
但是，用<e0>在线字典的网址</e0>字段寻找在线词典更简单：
这真的会让人大开眼界！
Item has neither URLs nor commands.
项目既没有网址也没有命令。
Item name is empty or missing
缺少项目名称或名称为空
Its purpose is to develop, distribute and support the use of OmegaT, an open-source translation memory software application.
其目的是开发、发行开源翻译记忆软件OmegaT，并对其使用提供支持
正在载入 TMX 文件...
本地化经理、用户组主管
Localizing OmegaT into other languages is also an ongoing task, since new features and functions are being added all the time.
将 OmegaT 本地化为其他语言是一项持续的工作，因为一直都在增加新的特性和功能。
Many of you reading this will be translators who have translated a lot of user documentation.
正在阅读的各位中有许多都曾翻译过很多用户文档。
每个文件的匹配统计数据(&F)
韦氏词典（Merriam Webster dictionary）——实际使用
Mourning and sorrow 404 not with us now Lost to paradise
悲痛又哀伤 404 不再陪伴我们身旁 迷失在天堂路上
Moves to the next already translated segment, ignoring untranslated segments.
移动到下一个已译片段，忽略未译片段。
Moves to the next segment that has no equivalent in the translation memory.
移动到下一个在翻译记忆库中无相同内容的片段。
Moves to the segment that does correspond to the current selected match in the <g0>Fuzzy matches</g0> pane.
移动到与当前<g0>模糊匹配</g0>面板中所选择的匹配内容不一致的片段。
Navigate to and select the folder you created for dictionaries.
浏览并选择为词典创建的文件夹。
New translation memories placed in the <f0>/tm</f0> folder while translating are loaded automatically as soon as the cursor moves from one segment to another.
当光标从一个片段移动到下一个片段， <f0>/tm</f0> 文件夹的翻译记忆就会被自动更新。
No action is taken, if no Machine Translation service has been activated (in <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Machine Translate</g2> </m0>).
如果未激活任何机器翻译服务（在<m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>机器翻译</g2> </m0>中
Note that <f0>Remove</f0> physically removes the selected vocabularies.
注意<f0>删除</f0>会移除选择的词汇表。
Note that in addition to "source-target" dictionaries you can, using the Dictionary feature, obtain access to information such as:
请注意，除了“原语-目标语”词典之外，还可以使用“词典”功能获取对以下信息的访问：
Note that the "Install" function requires an Internet connection.
请注意“安装”功能需要因特网连接。
Note that this will of course check for the standard (Castillian) rather than for Mexican Spanish.
注意这显然会以标准（卡斯提尔）西班牙语进行检查，而非墨西哥西班牙语。
Note: <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Enter</k2> </k0> is an alternate shortcut if <l3>Use TAB to Advance</l3> option is not selected.
提示：当 <l3>使用Tab键前进</l3> 未被选择时，.<k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Enter</k2> </k0> 也可作为其功能的快捷键。
Note: <k0>Enter</k0> is an alternate shortcut if <l1>Use TAB to Advance</l1> option is not selected.
提示：<k0>Enter</k0> 是 <l1>使用Tab键前进</l1>的快捷键。
ODFAuthors and LibreOffice's Italian translators are proud to use such a good tool for their hard work within the LibreOffice Community.
ODFAuthors 和 LibreOffice 的意大利语译者对于可以使用这样一款好工具来处理 LibreOffice 社区的工作感到很满足。
Of course it is much wiser, to take a short break and download the correct versions of the spell checker.
当然，下载正确版本的拼写检查器更明智。
OmegaT automatically saves translations every 3 minutes as well as when you close the project or quit OmegaT.
OmegaT 每 3 分钟自动保存一次翻译，在关闭项目或退出 OmegaT 前也会自动保存。
OmegaT can generate and store a master password so you don't have to enter it each time, but this is much less secure.
OmegaT 可以生成并存储主密码，因此您不必每次都输入密码，但这样做的安全性要低得多。
OmegaT encrypts sensitive passwords and API keys with a master password.
OmegaT 用主密码来加密敏感密码和 API 密钥。
OmegaT has a built-in spell checker based on the spelling checker used in Apache OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Firefox and Thunderbird.
OmegaT内置拼写检查器，它基于Apache OpenOffice、LibreOffice、Firefox和Thunderbird中使用的拼写检查器。
OmegaT 已自动选择“是”选项。
OmegaT is supplied with a comprehensive user manual.
OmegaT 附带有全面详细的用户手册。
OmegaT 是用 Java 编写的。
OmegaT isn't just a product; it's an exciting project, and you can be part of it.
OmegaT不仅是一款产品；它是一个激动人心的项目，你可以参与其中。
OmegaT ran out of memory, and will quit when you press OK.
OmegaT 耗尽了内存，点击确定后将会退出。
OmegaT videos on the Qabiria YouTube channel.
Qabiria YouTube 频道上的 OmegaT 视频。
One of the most useful things OmegaT users can do is... to use OmegaT.
用户可以做的最有用的事情之一就是……使用 OmegaT。
Only rows with the <g0>Keep</g0> box ticked in the first column will be included when the translation memory is created.
翻译记忆库创建时，只包含首列 <g0>Keep</g0> 选项框处于勾选状态的行。
Open the <f0>.UTF8</f0> file generated in the <f1>/target</f1> folder.
打开 <f1>目标</f1> 文件中产生的 <f0>UTF8</f0> 文件 。
打开 {0} 个原文文件位置
打开 {0} 个译文文件位置
Opens a new <l0>Search and replace window</l0>.
Opens a project package in the MED format defined by the EU Directorate-General for Translation.
打开 MED 格式的项目包。此格式由欧盟翻译总局定义。
Opens the <l0>Editor</l0> options in the Preferences dialog.
在首选项对话框中打开 <l0>编辑器</l0> 选项。
Opens the <l0>File Filters</l0> options in the Preferences dialog.
在首选项对话框中打开 <l0>文件过滤器</l0> 选项。
Opens the <l0>Segmentation Setup</l0> options in the Preferences dialog.
在首选项对话框中打开 <l0>片段分割</l0> 选项。
Opens the local directory where OmegaT configuration files are stored (depends on the Operating system).
打开存储着 OmegaT 配置文件的本地目录（取决于操作系统）。
Opens this manual in the default browser.
在默认浏览器中打开本手册。
Original author of the OmegaT application
OmegaT 应用程序的原作者
Page slips through fingers Pulse pounding hard and frantic Vanishing like mist
心脏狂跳似要冲出嗓子 页面自指缝中流逝 如迷雾般消失
Place the dictionary files you wish to use in this folder.
将要使用的词典文件放到此文件夹中。
Please consult the documentation about your recovery options and return the information below to the software manufacturer with a description of how this error was produced.
请参阅文档来获取恢复方法，并请将以下信息配上错误描述回报给软件制造商。
Please contact the <a0>OmegaT Localization Co-ordinator</a0> for details of what is involved in localizing/translating OmegaT.
请联系 <a0>OmegaT 本地化协调人员</a0>来获取本地化/翻译 OmegaT 所涉及的内容。
Please enter your password again for confirmation.
请再次输入您的密码进行确认。
Please type or paste the URL of the mediawiki page
请输入或者粘贴 MediaWiki 页面的网址
Press the keyboard shortcut you wish to assign, then click OK.
按下要分配的键盘快捷键，然后单击“确定”。
Press the space bar (shortcut for <m0> <g1>Edit</g1> <g2>Start Pinpoint Align</g2> </m0>).
按下空格键（ <m0> <g1>Edit</g1> <g2>Start Pinpoint Align</g2> </m0>的快捷键）。
Pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Shift</k2> <k3>F</k3> </k0> displays the last already opened Search window (instead of opening a new one).
Procedure for using OmegaT to localize Magento.
用 OmegaT 本地化 Magento 的流程。
Procedure for using OmegaT to localize XLIFF files exported from Wordpress.
用 OmegaT 本地化从 Wordpress 导出 XLIFF 文件的流程。
Procedure for using OmegaT to localize the NetBeans IDE.
用 OmegaT 本地化 Netbeans IDE 的流程。
Programming is certainly the most important function, and without programming, there is no program.
编程确实是最重要的，没有编程就不会有程序。
Project commands are disabled for security reasons.
出于安全原因禁用项目命令。
Rather than beep Or a rude error message These words: 'Page not found'
不会哔哔哔 也没有粗鲁的出错讯息 “页面找不到”就是全部的东西
Reloads the project to take external changes in source files and project settings into account.
重新加载项目，让对原文文件与项目设置的外部更改生效。
Replace &glossary hits when inserting source text
插入原文文本时替换命中的词汇表条目(&G)
用匹配或所选内容替换译文
Replaces the target segment with the translation, provided by the selected Machine Translation service.
用所选机器翻译服务提供的译文替换掉译文片段。
Replaces the whole target segment with the currently selected fuzzy match (by default the first match is selected).
用当前选中的模糊匹配（默认情况下会选中第一个匹配）替换掉整个译文片段。
Replaces the whole target segment with the source.
用原文替换掉整个目标片段。
Restores the status before the last editing action was cancelled.
恢复到取消上一个编辑操作之前的状态。
Restores the status before the last editing action was taken.
恢复到取消上一个编辑操作之前的状态。
Right-clicking on an underlined word (Artund in the figure above) opens a drop-down menu listing suggestions for the correction (Art und).
右键点击带下划线的词汇（上图中是 "Artund"）会打开下拉菜单，其中列出了更正建议（Art und）。
Saves the internal translation memory to the hard disk.
将内部的翻译记忆库保存到硬盘。
Saves the translation and closes the project.
允许用户在默认的词汇表文件中创建条目。
Search for the required language combination - for instance on the <u0>dictionary links given by the OmegaT Wiki</u0>.
搜索所需的语言组合——例如通过<u0>OmegaT Wiki给出的词典链接</u0>。
See <l0>How to use a team project</l0> for details.
选择 <l0>如何使用团队项目</l0> 来查看详情。
Select <g0>Taas Terminology Lookup</g0> to activate this lookup.
选择 <g0>Taas术语查询</g0> 来激活查询功能。
选择要检查的问题类型。
Select this menu item, if the current translation does not apply and enter the alternative translation.
如果当前译文不适用，请选择此菜单条目，然后输入替代译文。
Selects the previous, the next or the Nth fuzzy match displayed in the fuzzy match pane to replace or insert it to the segment.
选择显示在模糊匹配窗格中的上一个、下一个或第 N 个模糊匹配来将其替换或插入到片段中。
Self-paced online training course in English (for purchase)
英语自学在线培训教程（付费）
Set a master password to protect your private data.
设置主密码以保护您的私人数据。
同时处理多个多文件项目
Simultaneous use of multiple translation memories
同时使用多个翻译记忆库
Since the project's inception, it has received the support of dozens of other contributors, too numerous to mention here, but for whose help we are very grateful.
项目启动以来，得到了许多贡献者的支持，人数太多在此无法全部列出，但我们非常感激他们的帮助。
Some of the dictionaries have no strings attached - i.e. are "Free to use", and others, like the selection above, are under the GPL license.
一些词典没有附加条件，即“可自由使用”，其他诸如上述列出的词典需要GPL许可证。
Such auxiliary code has already been written in Javascript, Groovy and Tcl/Tk, for instance.
已经有用 Javascript、Groovy 和 Tcl/Tk 等语言所编写的此类辅助性代码。
Thanks to the work of translators in the past, OmegaT's user interface and/or Help texts have been translated into several languages.
归功于过往翻译人员的工作，OmegaT 的用户界面及帮助文本已经被翻译成多种语言。
That means that if you feel so inclined, you may modify OmegaT to suit your own requirements.
这意味着如果您想，可以修改 OmegaT 以满足您自己的要求。
That means that users like you are free to download and use it with very little in the way of restrictions.
这意味着像您这样的用户可以免费下载并使用，只有极少的限制。
That means there are only a few thousand left!
这意味着只剩下几千种语言了！
The <g0>Viterbi</g0> and <g1>Forward-Backward</g1> algorithms are two different calculation methods.
<g0>Viterbi</g0> 和 <g1>Forward-Backward</g1> 算法是两种不同的计算方法。
The HTML user manual for OmegaT standard version.
HTML 格式的 OmegaT 标准版用户手册。
The OmegaT project is maintained by an informal, international group of volunteers.
OmegaT 项目由非正式国际志愿者团队维护
The OmegaT project would benefit from greater support from volunteers in almost all areas.
OmegaT 项目得益于来自世界各地志愿者的大力支持。
The created target documents are located in the <f0>target</f0> folder.
创建的译文文档位于<f0>目标</f0> 文件夹。
The current project must be reloaded in order to apply these changes
必须重新加载当前项目才能应用这些更改
The documents are opened by the application chosen by the operating system.
这些文档是用操作系统所选择的应用程序打开的。
The entry will be greyed, if there's just one translation available.
如果只有一个可用译文，则该条目将为灰色。
The exported contents are copied to the file <f1>selection.txt</f1> located in the User's preference files folder.
时，此文件并不会被清空，以与常规的剪贴板行为一致。
The following example shows Merriam Webster 10th dictionary "in action":
以下示例展示了实际使用中的第10版韦氏字典：
The following tutorials are available online/for download:
以下教程可供在线查阅或下载：
The help page you seek Lies beyond our perception But others await
你所寻找的页面 超越我们的观念 但其余仍待你发现
The interval of 3 minutes can be changed in <l0><m1> <g2>Options</g2> <g3>Preferences</g3> <g4>Saving and Output</g4> </m1></l0>.
3分钟的间隔时间可以在 <l0><m1> <g2>选项</g2> <g3>首选项</g3> <g4>保存和输出</g4> </m1></l0>中进行修改。.
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (<g0>Project > Properties</g0>).
文件名必须与项目属性对话框中定义的译文语言的语言代码相对应（ <g0>项目 > 属性</g0> ）。
The next segment with a note attached to it, will open.
会打开下一个带有备注的片段。
The one and the same segment may, depending on the context, require different translations.
一个片段和另一个相同的片段可能会因为上下文而需要不同的译文。
The password you entered did not match.
The perfect companion for those of us who don't need complexity but efficiency; glossaries, auto-complete and automatic translation makes my work in literary translation so much more efficient
对于我们这些追求高效而非复杂的人来说，它是完美的伙伴；词汇表、自动完成和自动翻译使我在文学翻译方面的工作更加高效
The philosophy of the project is described <a0>here</a0>.
项目理念在<a0>此处</a0>有所描述。
The previous segment with a note will open.
会打开上一个带有备注的片段。
The principal members of the project are:
The segment is opened when either its segment call-out or segment number is entered.
在输入片段的序号或编号后就会打开该片段。
The selected languages will then be installed and will eventually appear in your spell checker setup window (this may take a while).
随后选中的语言将会安装，并最终显示在拼写检查器窗口中（可能需要一段时间）。

The spell checker uses the target language code to determine the language to be used : if the target language is Brazilian Portuguese (PT_BR), the subfolder with vocabularies must contain the two vocabulary files, called <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.
拼写检查使用译文语言代码来确定要使用的语言：如果译文语言是巴西葡萄牙语（PT_BR），存放词汇表的子文件夹必须包含两个名为<e0>pt_br.aff</e0>和<e1>pt_br.dic</e1>的词汇文件。
The title of the dialog reflects the file actually used (which depends on how many instances of OmegaT are running concurrently).
对话框的标题反映了实际使用的文件（这取决于并发运行的 OmegaT 实例的数量）。
The user manual for OmegaT in PDF format ({{ site.data.versions.standard.name }}).
PDF 格式的 OmegaT 用户手册（{{ site.data.versions.standard.name }}）。
There are essentially two ways in which you can do this.
基本上有两种方法可以做到这一点。
There are many plugins available for OmegaT online.
线上有很多 OmegaT 插件可供使用。
There is no need to instruct OmegaT to use a particular spelling dictionary; OmegaT will use the correct language dictionary based upon the language codes of your project.
并不需要指示 OmegaT 使用特定的拼写词典，它会根据项目的语言代码来使用正确的语言词典。
There should be three files, with extensions <e1>dz, idx </e1>and <e2>ifo</e2>.
应该有三个文件，扩展名分别为<e1>dz，idx</e1>和<e2>ifo</e2>。
These settings apply to OmegaT level, to all projects.
这些设置是应用到 OmegaT 级别的，对所有项目生效。
These three are certain: Death, taxes, and page not found You, victim of one
世间三事确定无疑： 死亡、税收、和找不到页面的问题。你，受害于其中之一。
These utilities enable OmegaT to be used to translate file formats for which XLIFF conversion filters are available.
这些功能让 OmegaT 可用于翻译 XLIFF 转换过滤器可用的文件格式。
This can apply also to <g0>Target term</g0> and <g1>Comment </g1>fields if new selections are made and <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>Shift</k4> <k5>G</k5> </k2> pressed again.
允许用户在默认的词汇表文件中创建条目。
This command does not work once the modified segment has been validated.
如果修改后的片段已经确认，则该命令不起作用。
This function is specific to team projects.
此功能是团队项目特有的。
This is the way text will look when displayed.
这是文本显示时的样子。
This menu displays entries only when a project is open.
仅在打开项目后本菜单才会有条目显示。.
This option only appears if both the selected files are recognised as Key=Value files.
仅当两个文件都被识别为 键=值 文件时才会出现此选项。
This works even if the keys are not in the same order in the two files, and/or if the two files do not contain the same amount of information.
即使两个文件中键的顺序不同或两个文件包含的信息数量不等，这种方式也有效。

要从 OmegaT 中调出手册，只需选择“帮助 > 用户手册”或按 F1。
To enable the spell checker, select <g0>Options > Spell Checking</g0> and tick the <g1>Automatically check the spelling of text</g1> check box (see above).
要启用拼写检查器，选择<g0>选项 > 拼写检查</g0>，并勾选<g1>自动检查文字拼写</g1>复选框(见上文)。
To find the version most suitable for you, follow the link below to the Download Selector.

单独修改一个或多个片段的位置，选中片段后按下 <u0>U</u0> (<g1>向上</g1>) 或 <u2>D</u2> (<g3>向下</g3>).
To translate the contents of a Wikipedia page (for example):
要翻译 Wikipedia 页面的内容（例如）：
用 Rainbow 和 OmegaT 进行翻译
Translation units are located in cells in the two last columns.
翻译单元位于最后两列的单元格中。
网址中缺少 URL 字符串

无法建立新的 TMX 文件！
Unicode (UTF-8) support: can be used with non-Latin alphabets
Unicode（UTF-8）支持：可用于非拉丁字母
Uploads to the repository the files that have been added or modified locally in the <f0>source</f0> directory.
将本地 <f0>原文</f0> 文件夹中修改的内容提交到远程仓库。.
Uploads to the repository the files that have been created locally in the <f0>target</f0> directory.
将本地 <f0>目标</f0> 文件夹中修改的内容提交到远程仓库。
对词典条目使用模糊匹配(&F)
对词典条目使用模糊匹配(&F)
对词汇表条目使用词干分析(&S)
Use <g0>ID comparison</g0> mode to align Key=Value texts.
使用 <g0>ID comparison</g0> 模式对齐 键=值 文本。
Use <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>F3</k2> </k0> to cycle through the four alternatives.
使用 <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>F3</k2> </k0>可以在四个选项中循环切换。
Use terms &appearing separately in the source text
使用分开出现在原文文本中的词条(&A)
Use this command to register the translation to be identical to the source, even if <l0><g1>Allow translation to be equal to source</g1></l0> is not checked.
本命令用来登记与源文完全相同的译文，即使<l0><g1>允许译文和源文相同</g1></l0> 并未选中
Use untar utility (or its equivalent, for instance<f0> winrar</f0> in Windows) to extract its contents into the project folder "Dictionary".
使用untar实用程序（或其等价物，例如Windows中的<f0>winrar</f0>）将其内容提取到项目文件夹“ Dictionary”中。
User glossaries with recognition of inflected forms
带词形变化识别的用户词汇表
Valter Mura -英语 > 意大利语译者
When the two columns are sufficiently aligned, click <g0>Save TMX...</g0> to create the resulting translation memory.
两列充分对齐后，点击 <g0>Save TMX...</g0> 创建生成的翻译记忆库。
When the user exits <a0>OmegaT</a0>, this file is not emptied, in order to be consistent with usual clipboard behavior.
如果未选择任何文本，则将当前原文片段写入该文件。
When you have finished your translation, to import it into Wikipedia:
当你完成了翻译后，将其导入 Wikipedia：
Wind catches lily Scatt'ring petals to the wind: Your page is not found
百合风中摇 花瓣随风飘 你的页面找不到
With this command you can move backward one segment at a time, to return later to the current segment using <g0>Forward in history...</g0>command below.
使用此命令，你可以回到上一个片段，如果稍后要回到当前的片段，使用下方的<g0>在历史记录中前进...</g0>命令。
With this command you can step forward to the segment, you have previously left by the <g1>Back in history</g1>... command.
使用此命令你可以前进到用 <g1>在历史记录中回溯</g1>...命令之前的处理片段。
Work with more than 30 file formats
可处理超过 30 种文件格式大小写
You are also free to copy it and pass it on to other people.
你同样可以自由地将其复制并传给其他人。
You can also call up the user manual supplied with OmegaT without launching OmegaT itself.
你也可以在不启动 OmegaT 的情况下调出附带的用户手册。
You can also instruct the spell checker to ignore all the occurrences of the mis-spelled word, or add it to the dictionary.
此外，也可以指示拼写检查器忽略所有出现该拼写错误词汇的地方，或者将它添加到词典中。

You can either copy files manually, i.e. from elsewhere on your system, using your file manager; or you can use OmegaT's <e0>"Install new dictionary"</e0> function to provide a list of available dictionaries to select from.
可以用文件管理器从系统中其他位置手动复制文件，或使用 OmegaT 的 <e0>“安装新词典”</e0>功能来提供可选择的词典列表。
You can find detailed statistic information in the file: {0}
可在以下文件中找到详细统计信息： {0}
You may also copy the files to your project's 'source' folder using your favorite file manager and reload the project by calling Reload from the Project menu.
也可以用偏爱的文件管理器将文件复制到项目的“source”文件夹，然后通过调用项目菜单中的重新载入项目命令来重新载入项目。
You may try to solve this problem in one of the following ways:
可以尝试使用下列方法之一来解决此问题：
You will be prompted to enter this password every time you launch OmegaT.
每次启动 OmegaT 时，系统都会提示您输入此密码。
Your project does not contain any files in a supported file format.
您的项目不包含任何所支持格式的文件。
